task.title: Account Detail - Quotas
task.shortdesc: Quotas let you define limits on resources that users for this account is allowed to create. The quotas you define will be saved as a policy that will appear in the account's policy list.

step.cmd: Expand the section for each service that you want to specify limits for, and type in the maximum number of that resource in the text field. Leaving a text field blank means no limit is assigned to that resource.
When you are finished setting quotas, click the Save Quotas button to save your work, or click the Cancel button to cancel.
step.stepresult: Specified quotas are displayed in a list under the Add Access Policy button of the General tab.
